translation.en: [boy] Fight! I gotta go see this!
[boy 2] Hey, they're fighting! Come on!
No! No!
It's your third fight, and it's only the third day of school.
translation.es: Llevan tres peleasen tres días de clases.

translation.en: She told everyone I have herpes!
translation.es: ¡Le dijo a todos que tengo herpes!

translation.en: Only so I could start a GoFundMe,
which was a total bust, 'cause turns out everyone has it.
translation.es: pero fue un fiascoporque todos lo padecen.

translation.en: See? She's a child, and children sometimes need to be hit.
translation.es: ¿Lo ve? Es una niña, y a los niñosa veces hay que pegarles.

translation.en: Hey, we're not gonna hit.
-We can bite, right? -[Principal] Violence is not the answer.
And, Gloria, I expect more from you. You are sophomore class president.
translation.es: Gloria, espero más de ticomo delegada de 2.º año.

translation.en: I'm sensing some preferential treatment that borders on inappropriate.
translation.es: Percibo tratamiento especialque raya en lo inadecuado.

translation.en: Does this require a call to the school board or your wife?
translation.es: ¿Acaso debería llamara la junta escolar o a su esposa?

translation.en: Gloria, biting's okay as long as you don't break the skin.
translation.es: Gloria, morder está bien,pero sin sangre.

translation.en: Mr. Salazar, if you don't get your daughters in line--
translation.es: Sr. Salazar, si no corrige a sus hijas…

translation.en: Don't worry. I'll hit them so hard.
translation.es: No se preocupe. Les voy a pegar duro.

translation.en: I mean, metaphorically. I'll hit them hard with life lessons.
translation.es: Es un decir. Les voy a pegarcon lecciones de vida.

translation.en: Good. Next time, it's expulsion.
You can't be home all day. I don't care that you're motherless or my nieces.
translation.es: No pueden quedarse en casa. No importa que no tengan madreo que sean mis sobrinas.

translation.en: The last time I'm gonna save you fools. My fee has gone up. I'm too busy for this!
translation.es: Es la última vez que las salvo.Les cobraré más. ¡No tengo tiempo!

translation.en: Sorry we interrupted your game of Animal Crossing, Tío.
Appreciate it. But today's stunt is still gonna cost you each a hundy.
translation.es: Agradézcanlo. Lo de hoyles va a costar 100 a cada una.

translation.en: You got a week to settle your debt, or I'll reroute the home phone.
translation.es: Tienen una semana para pagaro haré que las llamadas a la casa

translation.en: Instead of coming to my cell,
translation.es: dejen de entrar a mi celular

translation.en: all calls from the school are going straight to your father.
translation.es: y que la escuelallame directamente al de su padre.

translation.en: Now goodbye. You can walk home.
As opposed to what? You don't have a car!
translation.es: ¿Cuál era la otra opción?¡No tienes carro!

translation.en: [Salazar] One week!
This is your fault! No more!
I'm done! You can officially start taking care of yourself!
Green sauce.
What?
With enchiladas. That's what I want for dinner.
translation.es: Para las enchiladas.Eso quiero de cenar.

translation.en: Shit.
[grunts] She's ruining my life and probably my future.
translation.es: Está arruinando mi viday probablemente mi futuro.

translation.en: I'm on the cusp of getting expelled, and it's all your fault.
translation.es: Estoy a punto de ser expulsaday es culpa de ustedes.

translation.en: -Ours? -[Gloria] Yes!
Where were you assholes?
You were supposed to keep me from fighting Ines.
translation.es: Se supone que no iban a dejarmepelear con Inés.

translation.en: You know, it doesn't matter. You couldn't have stopped me anyway.
translation.es: Ya no importa.No hubieran podido detenerme.

translation.en: These fists were made for my sister's face.
translation.es: Estos puños fueron hechospara golpear la cara de mi hermana.

translation.en: That's it. I give up.
What God gives with both hands to some people,
translation.es: Lo que Dios le dacon ambas manos a algunos,

translation.en: he clearly only gave with his pinkie to me.
translation.es: a mí solo me lo dio con el meñique.

translation.en: No, God gave you the middle finger.
translation.es: No, Dios te dió el dedo de en medio.

translation.en: I am not gonna let my little sister ruin my reputation!
translation.es: ¡No voy a dejar que mi hermanitaarruine mi reputación!

translation.en: Oh, Glo, your rep is already wrecked.
For me and Demi, people are starting to associate her with us, and us with her!
translation.es: Para mí y Demi,¡la gente nos asocia con ella!

translation.en: Take back control.
I read your horoscope, and your third house of communication is energized.
translation.es: Leí tu horóscopo. Tu tercera casade la comunicación tiene energía.

translation.en: There's never been a better time to tell Ines how you feel and break free.
translation.es: Es el mejor momento para decirlea Inés lo que sientes y liberarte.

translation.en: Yes, let's all break free and live like it's freshman year again,
translation.es: Sí, tenemos que liberarnosy vivir como si fuera el primer año

translation.en: when Ines was in middle school and life was good.
translation.es: cuando Inés estaba en otra escuela.Era mejor así.

translation.en: I mean, being a sophomore is hard enough without Ines' vibes.
translation.es: Estar en 2.º ya es difícilsin las vibras de Inés.

translation.en: Or Andre's.
Okay, calm your tits, missy. I'm dumping Andre. It's happening.
translation.es: Tranquila, señorita.Voy a terminar con Andre. Lo haré.

translation.en: I hope.
Truth talk. Ines is a black hole of negativity.
translation.es: Inés es un hoyo negro de energía negativa.

translation.en: I personally could use an Ines cleanse, but you need one!
translation.es: ¡Me caería bien una limpia,pero a ti te urge!

translation.en: [boy] We all need one.
It's time! We've evolved, and she hasn't.
She's the tag-along who put dog shit in my backpack on the way to school!
translation.es: ¡Todavía es el pegoteque puso caca de perro en mi mochila!

translation.en: And gave me bangs on the back of my head!
translation.es: ¡Y que me cortó un copeteatrás de la cabeza!

translation.en: And now I have herpes!
-Oh my God. -I don't have herpes.
But my sister sucks, and I need boundaries.
translation.es: Pero mi hermana es una molestiay necesito límites.

translation.en: -Can I borrow two dollars? -Borrow? Am I gonna get it back?
After I pay my tío.
translation.es: Después de pagarle a mi tío.

translation.en: -I can't believe I'm buying Ines dinner. -[Gloria] I'm sorry.
translation.es: - Encima debo pagar por su cena.- Disculpa.

translation.en: We owe Tío Tonio a thousand dollars.
translation.es: Le debemos mil dólares a mi tío Tonio.

translation.en: A thousand dollars? How are you gonna pay it?
We don't accept these.
But they're silver dollars! They are worth way more than face value!
translation.es: ¡Pero son dólares de plata!¡Valen más que un dólar normal!

translation.en: Have you seen the box with all my baby stuff?
translation.es: ¿Has visto la cajacon mis cosas de bebé?

translation.en: I'm trying to find a silver spoon Tía Maria gave me.
translation.es: Quiero la cucharita de plataque me dio mi tía María.

translation.en: I could get a good chunk of change for it, with silver being so valuable these days.
translation.es: Podrían pagarme bien por ellaporque la plata cuesta más hoy en día.

translation.en: Like maybe even $150.
[Ines] Mm, more like $310.
Really? You think?
-[Ines] That's what I got for it. -You sold it?
Bitch, stop stressing. Things will work out like they always do.
translation.es: Deja de estresarte.Todo va a resolverse, como siempre.

translation.en: Things don't just magically work out!
They work out because I figure them out for you!
Yeah, because I have faith.
Okay.
Faith is bullshit.
Having a plan, doing the work. That's what gets you money.
translation.es: Tener un plan, hacer el trabajo.Así se consigue el dinero.

translation.en: [man] What are you doing in here?
And where did you get that split lip?
translation.es: ¿Y qué te pasó en el labio?

translation.en: -Demi. -Why are you still friends with her?
I don't know.
Oh my.
I was sorting through my things to sell. I wasn't gonna touch Mom's stuff.
translation.es: Buscaba qué vender entre mis cosas.Las de mamá no.

translation.en: I gave this to your mother on our--
translation.es: Le regalé esto a su mamáen nuestra tercera cita…

translation.en: -[all] On your third date. -[all chuckle]
You can look through Mom's boxes too. See if there's anything to sell.
translation.es: Pueden ver en sus cajas.Tal vez haya algo que vender.

translation.en: Just not this.
Oh, and Saturday, I invited a friend to my birthday dinner.
translation.es: Ah, invité a alguien a mi cenade cumpleaños el sábado.

translation.en: Oh shit!
We forgot to get Dad a birthday gift.
Ines, while I get ready for this sale to pay off our debt, you get Dad a gift.
translation.es: Ve por el regalo mientras preparo la ventapara pagar nuestra deuda.

translation.en: Or you get Dad a gift, and I'll put my name on it.
translation.es: O tú ve por el regaloy yo le agregaré mi nombre.

translation.en: [Gloria] She's done!
While we know the toxicity's never gonna leave my family,
translation.es: Sé que la tóxica jamás saldráde mi familia,

translation.en: I think I found a way for it to leave the friend group.
translation.es: pero ya sé cómo sacarlade nuestro grupo.

translation.en: I deal with Ines at home and ice her out at school.
translation.es: Lidiaré con Inés en casapero la ignoraré en la escuela.

translation.en: What are we celebrating?
-Do it! -[boy] It's easy.
Do it!
Hey!
There's my complicated ray of light,
translation.es: Ahí está mi rayo de sol complicado,

translation.en: like sunshine peeking through a lot of grumpy clouds.
translation.es: como la luz que saleentre un montón de nubes.

translation.en: I haven't seen you since second period.
translation.es: No te he visto desde la mañana.

translation.en: Mm, I miss your smell.
You first. Do it.
No, no, no, ladies first.
Someone go first. This is annoying.
Yeah. Okay. I just wanna say I need to…
translation.es: Bueno. Iba a decir que necesito hacer…

translation.en: Shit!
I'll come with. I have Poo-Pourri!
And I gotta practice my double-arm hang. Getting timed for the record this week.
translation.es: Debo practicar mi resistencia colgando.Pronto medirán mi tiempo para el récord.

translation.en: Is it just me, or does it feel like
this friend group needs to be smaller, more intimate?
translation.es: este grupo tiene que ser más pequeño?

translation.en: Yeah, one of us definitely isn't honoring their purpose.
translation.es: Sí, uno de nosotrosno está honrando su propósito.

translation.en: How are we gonna tell Cam he's out?
[Demi] Bitch has got to go.
We have to tell her, since Gloria never will.
translation.es: Tenemos que decirleporque Gloria nunca lo hará.

translation.en: I've never been more attracted to you.
Cam, stop.
You're in a relationship, and we're friends.
translation.es: Tienes una relación y somos amigos.

translation.en: Your new fixation on me is just an excuse
translation.es: Te fijaste en mí como excusa

translation.en: to avoid your feelings, or lack of them, for Andre.
translation.es: para evitar tus sentimientos,o falta de ellos, por Andre.

translation.en: Reminder, you don't do guilt well.
Maybe I should be alone.
Alone would be good for you.
But it's depressing. You know, I love love.
I just…
Don't love people. Yeah.
You know, I'm coming to realize there are few people I can even tolerate,
translation.es: Me he dado cuenta quehay muy pocas personas a las que tolero,

translation.en: which is why I was feeling like I might be feeling you.
translation.es: por eso pensé que me gustabas.

translation.en: Makes sense, and I'm honored, but this is just a part of your pattern.
translation.es: Tiene sentido, y lo agradezco,pero esto es parte de tu patrón.

translation.en: You need a new obsession to justify ditching the old one,
translation.es: Necesitas una nueva obsesiónpara olvidar la anterior,

translation.en: but maybe you shouldn't ditch. Maybe stick it out, break your pattern.
translation.es: pero tal vez no deberías.Quédate ahí un rato, rompe el patrón.

translation.en: Plus, you know I don't bone or home wreck. I'm not a Gemini.
translation.es: Además,  yo no tengo sexoni rompo hogares. No soy Géminis.

translation.en: And I won't be comfortable destroying the friend group
when we definitely have a bad breakup.
So we aren't gonna destroy it. We're just gonna trim it down by one.
translation.es: No lo vamos a destruir.Solo habrá uno menos.

translation.en: One Ines.
Two.
Andre's bye-bye. I'm ready to cut bait.
translation.es: Adiós a Andre. Estoy listo ya.

translation.en: Thank you for your rationalization and rejection.
I actually like the idea of me rolling solo.
translation.es: Me gusta la idea de estar solo.

translation.en: You know, wearing a cozy, soft gray cardigan.
translation.es: Ponerme un cardigan gris,suave y cómodo.

translation.en: No pockets!
See? This is why I've secretly been obsessed with you.
translation.es: Por eso siempre me has gustado en secreto.

translation.en: Liar, you have no secrets.
I do. Just never told you for the obvious reason.
translation.es: Los tengo. Pero nunca te dijepor obvias razones.

translation.en: Which is…
You'd wreck me.
-What are you doing? -Icing you out.
-Time for you to find your own friends. -Why? Your friends are my friends.
translation.es: - Consigue tus propios amigos.- ¿Para qué? Tengo los tuyos.

translation.en: No, my friends are my friends.
translation.es: No, mis amigos son mis amigos.

translation.en: Okay, that makes sense, but I don't have any of my own friends.
translation.es: Bueno, pero no tengo amigos propios.

translation.en: -I'm closing my door now. -Wait!
I did it! I told her she's out!
translation.es: ¡Lo hice!¡Le dije que consiga otros amigos!

translation.en: -And she just took it? -Yep!
[Demi] Okay, good! -I can delete her email. -What email?
translation.es: - ¡Genial! Ya puedo borrar el correo.- ¿Qué correo?

translation.en: The anonymous one, telling her to eat shit.
translation.es: El anónimo que le decíaque se joda.

translation.en: Send it!
No, don't. Just delete it. We're done.
[Cam] You said you were done.
-[chuckles] Yeah. -What happened to having boundaries?
translation.es: Sí. - ¿Qué pasó con los límites?- Los extendí.

translation.en: I extended the border. I gotta use her before I lose her.
translation.es: - ¿Qué pasó con los límites?- Los extendí. Necesito usarla antes de eso.

translation.en: Watch. Ines!
Those shirts aren't gonna fold themselves.
translation.es: Esas blusas no se doblarán solas.

translation.en: You see? She's my bitch.
translation.es: ¿Lo ven? Hace lo que le digo.

translation.en: Oh, okay. Customer coming. Go, go, go.
Hi!
I couldn't help but notice that you're having a yard sale.
translation.es: Vi que estás teniendo una venta.

translation.en: Right next to my yard sale.
translation.es: Justo al lado de la mía.

translation.en: Oopsie.
So, are they leaving?
Did you just buy a record?
She said it was a collectible.
Shoo! You gotta go!
Excuse me. How much for this?
One for six or two for ten.
translation.es: Uno por seis o dos por diez.

translation.en: Thanks.
Okay. You can stay.
I'd be happy to.
I'll even upsell your crap for 50% of the sales.
translation.es: Puedo tratar de venderlessus cosas por un 50 % de la venta.

translation.en: Deal.
First five sales go to the house.
translation.es: Las primeras cinco ventasson para la casa.

translation.en: Sheesh.
Found Andre a gift.
-But MM aren't his initials. -Exactly.
translation.es: - Pero sus iniciales no son MM.- Exacto.

translation.en: Wrong initials, a box. It's perfect.
He's gonna dump me after I give him this,
translation.es: Terminará conmigo cuando se la dé,

translation.en: especially when he keeps harping on how thoughtless I am.
translation.es: sobre todo porque siempre diceque no soy considerado.

translation.en: -Two bucks. -Which is exactly how much you owe me.
translation.es: - Dos dólares.- Justo lo que me debes.

translation.en: So transaction complete.
I'm looking for a monogrammed box.
translation.es: Estoy buscando una caja con iniciales.

translation.en: -Did it have the initials MM on it? -[woman] Yes.
Oh, I haven't seen it.
[woman] Seen it now?
It's [clears throat] sounding vaguely familiar.
[woman] $200.
Excuse me.
-I'll give you four bucks for the box. -No.
translation.es: - Te doy cuatro por la caja.- No.

translation.en: That's double what you paid.
My freedom from Andre is worth more than money.
translation.es: Liberarme de Andrevale más que eso.

translation.en: All right. There is a lady willing to pay 200 for it.
translation.es: Bueno, hay una señoraque quiere pagar 200 por ella.

translation.en: Where's the lady?
She was right there.
[Gloria] Trash. Trash.
Trash!
It's the lady from the yard sale when she was young.
translation.es: Es la misma señoracuando era joven.

translation.en: Must be why she wanted the box. It's hers.
translation.es: Por eso quería la caja. Es de ella.

translation.en: Glo! No!
Photos are sacred.
-What did you get Dad? -This cute top. Dad loves yellow on me.
translation.es: - ¿Qué le compraste a papá?- Esta blusa. Le encanta verme feliz.

translation.en: Thank you for being so reliably unreliable. Now go away.
translation.es: Gracias por ser tan poco fiable.

translation.en: Happy birthday, Dad. Pocket knife it is.
translation.es: Feliz cumpleaños, papá.Te toca la navaja.

translation.en: [Cam sighs] I gotta go.
-Why are you going out the back? -Andre's tracking my phone.
translation.es: - ¿Por qué te vas por atrás?- Andre me rastrea.

translation.en: I know 'cause I'm tracking his, but only 'cause he's tracking mine!
translation.es: ¡Lo sé porque yo lo rastreo,pero solo porque él lo hace!

translation.en: -Yeah. He's out front. Back door calls. -I better go too. I'll see ya.
translation.es: - Está afuera, al frente. Voy atrás.- También me voy. Nos vemos.

translation.en: [woman] $500.
Gloria!
[woman] $600!
Okay, I would love to take your money, but I don't have the box!
translation.es: Me encantaría aceptar su dinero,¡pero no tengo la caja!

translation.en: -[woman] Your friend does. He brought it. -Oh, you followed us home.
translation.es: - Tu amigo la tiene y la trajo.- Ah, nos siguió.

translation.en: That's very persistent, but it doesn't change the fact that I don't have what you're looking for.
translation.es: Qué persistente,pero no tengo lo que busca.

translation.en: That box is cursed.
Yikes. But still, I don't have it.
translation.es: ¡Qué mal! Aún así, no la tenemos.

translation.en: [chuckles] Excuse me! Just one second.
Don't sell.
If this lady's willing to pay you $1,000, then she knows something we don't.
translation.es: Si esta señora quiere pagar tantoes porque sabe algo que nosotros no.

translation.en: That box has to be worth way more than what she's offering.
translation.es: Esa caja debe valer más de lo que ofrece.

translation.en: Move over. Let the pro handle this.
translation.es: A un lado.Dejen que el profesional se encargue.

translation.en: Since we're family, I'll only charge a 50% negotiation fee.
translation.es: Como somos familia,solo te cobraré un 50 %.

translation.en: 30%. Final offer!
-25%. Final offer! -12.5%.
Deal!
[Demi] We're cursed!
[Gloria] We're not.
But we took things from the box. We all touched it.
translation.es: Pero tomamos cosas de la caja.Todos la tocamos.

translation.en: We're all part of it now. We have taken the darkness in.
translation.es: Todos estamos en esto.La oscuridad nos afecta.

translation.en: -We need to reverse the curse. -Or what?
Don't know! Every curse has its own rules!
I call bullshit. Curses aren't real.
translation.es: No creo. Las maldiciones no son reales.

translation.en: What if they are? We need to get the box and sell it.
No! We can't sell it. We don't know if we need it yet.
translation.es: ¡No! No podemos venderla.No sabemos si la necesitaremos.

translation.en: We need more info on the curse. That's rule number one.
translation.es: Lo primero esaprender más sobre la maldición.

translation.en: Of what?
Basic curse knowledge.
translation.es: Es lo básico de las maldiciones.

translation.en: We have to go to the place of origin, the yard sale,
translation.es: Debemos volver al lugar de origen,la venta,

translation.en: and find out where the box came from. We have to go now!
translation.es: y enterarnos de dónde salió la caja.¡Vamos ya!

translation.en: It's my dad's birthday, and we're about to have dinner!
translation.es: ¡Es el cumpleaños de mi papáy vamos a cenar!

translation.en: Dinner? Dinner is more important than undoing a lethal spell?
translation.es: ¿Cenar? ¿Acaso es más importanteque deshacer una maldición letal?

translation.en: You think it's lethal?
Now's not the time to debate this nonsense. Let's put a pin in it.
translation.es: No es el momento para debatirlo.Otro día.

translation.en: Or a nail in our coffin, because if we don't move quickly, we're all gonna die!
translation.es: Claro, ¡el día en que nos muramospor no movernos rápido!

translation.en: Okay! If we're gonna die, can you please perish in your own home?
translation.es: Si todos vamos a morir,¿podrías hacerlo en tu casa?

translation.en: -Hey, girls. -[man] Hi, Mr. Salazar!
I don't get you girls. Why is she still your friend?
translation.es: No las entiendo.¿Por qué siguen siendo amigas?

translation.en: Dad, your friend's here! What's his name?
translation.es: Papá, llegó tu amigo. ¿Cómo se llama?

translation.en: Lucia!
Is it warm in here?
I'll turn the air on.
[dad] Girls, talk. You're being rude.
translation.es: Niñas, digan algo. No sean groseras.

translation.en: So, what do you do?
I'm a lawyer.
So you like money.
Uh, most of my work is pro bono.
-[phone chimes] -[dad] Uh, Lucia volunteers at our church.
translation.es: A GLORIAPERDEDORA Y POBRE. Lucia es voluntaria en la iglesia.

translation.en: Our church? We don't go to church.
translation.es: ¿Qué iglesia? No vamos a la iglesia.

translation.en: Well, maybe we'll start going again.
translation.es: Bueno, tal vez volvamos a ir.

translation.en: We have to go to church?
Hi, I'm Tonio.
See you around.
Or not. [laughs]
Jeez. I'm just reading their faces. [chuckles]
translation.es: Vaya. Basta con verles las caras.

translation.en: Night, bitches!
PS, the knife is from all of us. Dile.
translation.es: P. D. La navaja es de parte de todos.

translation.en: -Did he just go into the pantry? -That's his room.
translation.es: ¿Se metió en la alacena? Es su habitación.

translation.en: Dad, happy birthday.
Oh, thank you! [chuckles]
Oh! Oh, oh, oh, oh, that's sharp! Ow!
Excuse me. Uh, let me get a tourniquet.
-Oh, honey! -[mouthing] Honey?
Oh, it's not a big deal. I just, uh… I tweaked my back.
translation.es: No es nada.Solo… me lastimé la espalda.

translation.en: [Gloria] I'll get you a Band-Aid. You should probably lie down.
translation.es: Iré por una curita. - Deberías acostarte.- ¡A solas!

translation.en: Right. Okay.
[exhales] Am I overreacting, or are we really in danger?
Spirit guides, give me a sign if we're damned.
translation.es: Espíritus guía,denme una señal si estamos malditos.

translation.en: Shit.
Do-over.
-Shit! -[knocking]
-You know I have a front door! -Yeah, too risky.
Andre's close by, per my phone.
translation.es: Andre está cerca, según mi celular.

translation.en: Hold up. Sage, crystals, cards… What's up?
I asked my spirit guides about the presence of evil,
translation.es: Le pregunté a mis espíritus guíasobre la presencia de la maldad,

translation.en: and it doesn't look good.
It doesn't. I got your text about the box. It's definitely cursed.
translation.es: Sí. Leí tu mensaje sobre la caja.Está maldita, definitivamente.

translation.en: It is? How do you know?
Because I gave Andre the box, and--
translation.es: Porque le di la caja a Andre y…

translation.en: Oh my God. What happened to Andre?
He loved it. Now he's never gonna let me go.
It's happening. It's starting. Cameron, I have a really bad feeling about this.
We need to…
Yeah?
…get the box back!
[Gloria] Ines.
Go to your bed.
You're right. There's no curse.
translation.es: Tienes razón. No hay una maldición.

translation.en: Dad's back is probably just jacked from all the kinky sex.
translation.es: Probablemente papá está mal de la espaldapor el sexo.

translation.en: -You think they're having sex? -It's been a long time for him.
translation.es: - ¿Crees que están teniendo sexo?- Tenía mucho tiempo sin.

translation.en: So maybe this is good for him.
translation.es: Tal vez sea bueno para él.

translation.en: And me. Now Dad won't spend so much time focused on his favorite. [sighs]
translation.es: Y para mí. Ahora no pasará tanto tiempoconcentrándose en su favorita.

translation.en: Must be nice to be annoyed by his attention.
translation.es: Debe ser lindo que te molesteque te dé tanta atención.

translation.en: It's all I want, and now I'm in third place.
translation.es: Es todo lo que quiero,pero llego tercera.

translation.en: Fourth. He focuses on Tío Tonio a little more than you.
translation.es: Cuarta. Se concentra másen mi tío Tonio que en ti.

translation.en: -Why'd he give her Mom's scarf? -I know.
translation.es: - ¿Por qué le dio la bufanda de mamá?- Sí pues.

translation.en: Who would take a dead woman's scarf?
translation.es: ¿Quién aceptaría la bufanda de una muerta?

translation.en: Unless it's just like a really freaking sweet gesture and symbol of a love that turned out so well.
translation.es: A menos que sea un gesto tiernoy símbolo de un amor que fue tan bonito.

translation.en: Did it?
Mom's dead.
She died.
She can keep the scarf.
translation.es: Que se quede con la bufanda.

translation.en: See? Even you think the bad juju's real.
translation.es: ¿Ves? Hasta tú creesen lo de la maldición.

translation.en: [Gloria] No, I don't.
If there's a curse, then that means there's a cause and effect to everything.
translation.es: Si hay una maldición, quiere decirque hay una causa y efecto para todo.

translation.en: And if that's true, what did Mom do to deserve to die?
translation.es: Si eso es verdad,¿qué hizo mamá para merecer morir?

translation.en: She didn't deserve to die,
and I didn't deserve to lose her.
Bad things just happen.
Go to bed.
We gotta move before things get worse
translation.es: Hagamos algo antes de que todo empeorey la novia de tu papá

translation.en: and your dad's new lady gets pregnant with a devil baby.
translation.es: Hagamos algo antes de que todo empeorey la novia de tu papá se embarace del diablo.

translation.en: We're not going to hell!
Thank you. Team Rational is back.
-Ah, what's with the one-eighty? -Andre.
He hasn't called or texted in 16 hours, which is a record by fifteen and a half.
translation.es: No ha llamado o escrito en 16 horas,superando su récord por 15 y media.

translation.en: You know why you haven't heard from him? 'Cause he's probably dead.
translation.es: ¿Sabes por qué no has oído de él?Debe estar muerto.

translation.en: Your rock broke.
This is impossible.
It's black obsidian. It's for protection.
And it's one of the strongest crystals there is!
translation.es: ¡Es uno de los cristales más fuertes!

translation.en: There's no way. This… This has to be--
translation.es: No puede ser. Esto tiene que ser…

translation.en: -But black magic is nonsense! -Agreed.
translation.es: - ¡Pero la magia negra no existe!- Sí.

translation.en: [Andre] Hey!
You guys are being crazy.
Andre must have used a new product
translation.es: Andre debe haber usado algo nuevo

translation.en: or a DIY chemical peel he doesn't wanna tell you about.
translation.es: o se hizo un peeling químicoy no quiere decírtelo.

translation.en: He said he did nothing out of the ordinary.
translation.es: Dijo que no hizo nada diferente.

translation.en: There is some rational explanation for what happened.
It's called a curse.
Because when some random old lady shows up at your door and tells you it's a curse, it's a curse!
translation.es: ¡Cuando una señora se aparece en tu casay te dice que es una maldición, lo es!

translation.en: -Or-- -No refunds!
None wanted. We just want info on this box that we purchased at your yard sale.
translation.es: No vinimos por eso. Queremos informaciónsobre la caja que le compramos.

translation.en: We think it might belong to this lady. Her picture was in the box.
translation.es: Creemos que es de esta señora.Su foto estaba en la caja.

translation.en: [Gloria] And she was looking for it.
This woman? This woman was looking for that box?
translation.es: Esta mujer.¿Esta mujer está buscando la caja?

translation.en: -She even showed up at our house. -Okay, what do you really want?
translation.es: - Apareció en nuestra casa.- ¿Qué quieren realmente?

translation.en: -What's your game? -There's no game. We just wanna find her.
translation.es: - ¿A qué están jugando?- No es un juego. Queremos encontrarla.

translation.en: Do you know her?
Yeah.
Yeah, I do.
She's dead.
I know I said the woman in the photo was the one looking for the box,
translation.es: Sé que dije que la mujer que queríacomprar la caja era la de la foto,

translation.en: but obviously, I was mistaken,
which happens, 'cause, not to be ageist, but all old people do look alike.
translation.es: No es por discriminar,pero todos los ancianos se parecen.

translation.en: We saw her. She was alive. What's it gonna take to convince you?
translation.es: La vimos. Estaba viva.¿Qué necesitas para convencerte?

translation.en: [Cam] Andre's face!
If that's not straight out of hell, I don't know what is!
translation.es: ¡Si eso no es infernal, no sé lo que es!

translation.en: Ines, back me up. Ooky spooky doesn't exist.
translation.es: Inés, tú debes apoyarme.La maldición no existe.

translation.en: I don't know, Glo.
It appears that we're not only damned, but we're also haunted.
translation.es: No es solo una maldición,también hay espíritus.

translation.en: That dead lady wants her box back.
translation.es: La muerta quiere su caja de vuelta.

translation.en: That's three for Team Ooky Spooky!
You've got to be kidding me!
For days, you've implored me to lose Ines, and now you back her up?
translation.es: Tienen días pidiéndome que aleje a Inés,¿y ahora están de acuerdo?

translation.en: You know what? Maybe there is a curse.
translation.es: Tal vez sí hay una maldición.

translation.en: But if there is, it didn't start the day we found the box.
translation.es: Pero no empezó el díaen que encontramos la caja.

translation.en: It started the day I got stuck taking care of you!
translation.es: ¡Empezó el día en el que me tuveque encargar de ti!

translation.en: I'm out.
[Demi] You can't be out! We have to stick together to break the black magic!
translation.es: ¡No puedes irte, debemos unirnospara romper la maldición!

translation.en: Yeah, since the three of you are suddenly so close,
translation.es: Como ustedes tres ahora son tan unidos,no necesitan mi ayuda para lidiar

translation.en: you don't need my help to handle this almighty scourge
translation.es: Como ustedes tres ahora son tan unidos,no necesitan mi ayuda para lidiar con la maldición que rompe piedrasy que hincha a la gente.

translation.en: that breaks rocks and makes people puffy.
translation.es: con la maldición que rompe piedrasy que hincha a la gente.

translation.en: Call me when it's life or death.
translation.es: Me avisan si es de vida o muerte.

translation.en: -Where's your sister? -Don't know. Don't care.
translation.es: - ¿Dónde está tu hermana?- No sé, no me importa.

translation.en: Where's my… [in Spanish] money?
[in English] Unknown caller.
Last time I got one of these, it was old Principal Richardson.
translation.es: La última vez que recibí una de estas,era el director Richardson.

translation.en: Okay, well, I'll just turn off call forwarding,
and whoever it is can just leave your dad a message.
translation.es: vayan directo al número de tu papá.

translation.en: No, answer it!
-An extra $100. -Twenty!
-Sixty! -Fifteen.
Fine!
[deep voice] Hello, this is Javier.
I understand.
[normal voice] I understand.
Can you spell that?
Okay, thank you.
Who was that?
Some, uh, auto warranty salesperson.
I promise you'll have your money. I just need a little more time.
translation.es: Prometo que te pagaré.Solo necesito más tiempo.

translation.en: Oh, don't worry about it. We're even.
translation.es: No te preocupes. Ya estamos a mano.

translation.en: [Gloria] I don't wanna talk to you, but I have to
because you're good at ethically questionable things.
translation.es: porque se te dalo éticamente cuestionable.

translation.en: We need to break into Tío Tonio's laptop. He's in the shower. No time to explain.
translation.es: Debemos entrar a la computadoradel tío Tonio. Está bañándose. Rápido.

translation.en: Fine. He took a call earlier and was super weird about it.
translation.es: Bueno. Hace rato recibió una llamaday se puso muy raro.

translation.en: -He said we don't owe him money anymore. -Isn't that good?
translation.es: - Dijo que ya no le debemos.- ¿Y no es bueno?

translation.en: Ines, something is going on.
And like all his other secrets, the answer lies in his search history.
translation.es: Y como todos sus otros secretos,la respuesta está en su historial.

translation.en: Should we be touching this with our bare hands?
-You're worried about fingerprints? -No! Sperm!
Do you remember his password?
[Tonio] I'm sorry I didn't tell you.
translation.es: Disculpen que no les haya dicho.

translation.en: No, we're sorry, Tío.
-I can't believe you have cancer. -I don't.
translation.es: - No puedo creer que tengas cáncer.- Yo no.

translation.en: -Your dad does. -What?
That call, it was about your dad.
translation.es: Esa llamada, fue sobre su papá.

translation.en: How long has he known?
He doesn't. That was the call to tell him.
translation.es: - ¿Hace cuánto que sabe?- No sabe. La llamada era para avisarle.

translation.en: He just went in for his back the morning after his birthday.
translation.es: Recién fue al médicoporque le dolía la espalda.

translation.en: He told me he had an MRI--
So this happened after his birthday?
After we gave him the knife from the box.
translation.es: Después de que le dimos la navajade la caja.

translation.en: [Tonio] I need to go lie down.
I said life or death.
Hey.
This is not your fault. We're gonna reverse it.
translation.es: No es tu culpa.Vamos a revertirlo.

translation.en: [Gloria] But what if we don't?
This isn't some money we owe Tío. This is Dad.
translation.es: Esto no se trata de deberle al tío.Se trata de papá.

translation.en: -You know why Dad doesn't think about you? -Oh, come on, Ines. Not now.
translation.es: - ¿Sabes por qué papá no piensa en ti?- Inés, no empieces.

translation.en: It's not because you're not his favorite.
translation.es: No es que no seas su favorita.

translation.en: -It's because you are. -It's not true. He doesn't think about me.
translation.es: - Es porque lo eres.- No es cierto. No piensa en mí.

translation.en: Because he doesn't have to. He trusts you.
translation.es: Porque no necesita hacerlo. Confía en ti.

translation.en: -He knows you have it all figured out-- -I'm not gonna figure this out!
translation.es: - Sabe que siempre encuentras la solución…- ¡No puedo solucionar esto!

translation.en: [Ines] Bullshit.
[whispers] Come here.
I'm sorry I said that thing about you earlier.
translation.es: Disculpa por lo que dijede ti más temprano.

translation.en: That was just the heat of the moment.
No, it wasn't.
You think it's a secret you all find me annoying?
translation.es: ¿Crees que no séque les molesta mi presencia?

translation.en: I may be an asshole, but I'm not dumb.
translation.es: Puede que sea pesada,pero no soy tonta.

translation.en: I'm sorry.
Me too.
I don't just love you, Gloria.
I like you.
So
translation.es: Te daré el espacio que mereces

translation.en: I'll give you the space that you deserve and find my own friends.
translation.es: Te daré el espacio que mereces y haré nuevos amigos.

translation.en: It's time. [chuckles]
I have an announcement.
-Where are you going? -Snacks.
-Can we please cut her now? -No!
-Why? -Because she's fearless.
And if we're gonna take on evil,
we need someone to fearlessly lead the way.
translation.es: necesitamos a alguienque nos guíe sin miedo.

translation.en: Or to potentially sacrifice.
translation.es: O a quien sacrificar, tal vez.

translation.en: -So you believe? -[Ines] She does.
It's a curse that we're gonna reverse.
translation.es: Es una maldición que vamos a revertir.

translation.en: We're gonna save my dad.
translation.es: Vamos a salvar a mi papá.

translation.en: -Okay, I have a plan. -Look, I have a plan.
translation.es: - Okey, tengo un plan.- Yo tengo un plan.

translation.en: -Okay, no, I have a plan. -No, but I know someone…
translation.es: - No, yo tengo un plan.- Yo conozco a alguien…
